00039 
00040 bool hasGreaterAbundance(const Chemistry::MassAbundance& a, const Chemistry::MassAbundance& b)
00041 {
00042     return a.abundance > b.abundance;
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 bool hasLessMass(const Chemistry::MassAbundance& a, const Chemistry::MassAbundance& b)
00047 {
00048     return a.mass < b.mass;
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 void test1()
00053 {
00054     using namespace Chemistry;
00055 
00056     MassDistribution md;
00057     md.push_back(MassAbundance(10, 1));
00058 
00059     IsotopeTable table(md, 10, 0);
00060 
00061     for (int i=1; i<=10; i++)
00062     {
00063         MassDistribution temp = table.distribution(i);
00064         unit_assert(temp.size() == 1);
00065         unit_assert(temp[0] == MassAbundance(i*10, 1));
00066         //cout << i << " atoms:\n" << temp << endl;
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 void test2()
00072 {
00073     using namespace Chemistry;
00074 
00075     const double p0 = .9;
00076     const double p1 = 1 - p0;
00077 
00078     MassDistribution md;
00079     md.push_back(MassAbundance(10, p0));
00080     md.push_back(MassAbundance(11, p1));
00081 
00082     IsotopeTable table(md, 10, 0);
00083 
00084 /*
00085     for (int i=0; i<=10; i++)
00086         cout << i << " atoms:\n" << table.distribution(i) << endl;
00087 */
00088 
00089     // test manually for 1 atom
00090 
00091     MassDistribution test1 = table.distribution(1);
00092     unit_assert(test1.size() == 2);
00093     unit_assert(test1[0] == md[0]); 
00094     unit_assert(test1[1] == md[1]); 
00095 
00096     // test manually for 10 atoms
00097     
00098     const int n = 10;
00099     MassDistribution good10; 
00100     double abundance = pow(p0, n);
00101     double mass = 100;
00102 
00103     for (int k=0; k<=n; k++)
00104     {
00105         good10.push_back(MassAbundance(mass, abundance));
00106         abundance *= p1/p0*(n-k)/(k+1);
00107         mass += 1;
00108     }
00109 
00110     sort(good10.begin(), good10.end(), hasGreaterAbundance);
00111 
00112     MassDistribution test10 = table.distribution(10);
00113     sort(test10.begin(), test10.end(), hasGreaterAbundance);
00114 
00115     unit_assert((int)test10.size() == n+1); 
00116 
00117     for (int k=0; k<=n; k++)
00118         unit_assert_equal(test10[k].abundance, good10[k].abundance, 1e-15);
00119 
00120     // test cutoff
00121     
00122     IsotopeTable table_cutoff(md, 10, 1e-8);
00123     unit_assert(table_cutoff.distribution(10).size() == 9);
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 void compare(const Chemistry::MassDistribution& test, const Chemistry::MassDistribution& good)
00128 {
00129     unit_assert(test.size() == good.size()); 
00130     for (unsigned int i=0; i<test.size(); i++)
00131     {
00132         unit_assert_equal(test[i].mass, good[i].mass, 1e-12);
00133         unit_assert_equal(test[i].abundance, good[i].abundance, 1e-12);
00134     }
00135 }

00137 
00138 void test3()
00139 {
00140     using namespace Chemistry;
00141 
00142     const double p0 = .9;
00143     const double p1 = .09;
00144     const double p2 = 1 - (p0 + p1);
00145 
00146     const double m0 = 10;
00147     const double m1 = 11;
00148     const double m2 = 12.33;
00149 
00150     MassDistribution md;
00151     md.push_back(MassAbundance(m0, p0));
00152     md.push_back(MassAbundance(m1, p1));
00153     md.push_back(MassAbundance(m2, p2));
00154 
00155 //    cout << "test3 distribution:\n" << md << endl;
00156 
00157     IsotopeTable table(md, 10, 1e-5);
00158 
00159     // compare distribution for 1 atom
00160     compare(table.distribution(1), md);
00161 
00162     // compare distribution for 2 atoms
00163     MassDistribution good3_2;
00164     good3_2.push_back(MassAbundance(m0*2, p0*p0));
00165     good3_2.push_back(MassAbundance(m0+m1, p0*p1*2));
00166     good3_2.push_back(MassAbundance(m0+m2, p0*p2*2));
00167     good3_2.push_back(MassAbundance(m1+m2, p1*p2*2));
00168     good3_2.push_back(MassAbundance(m1+m1, p1*p1));
00169     good3_2.push_back(MassAbundance(m2+m2, p2*p2));
00170     sort(good3_2.begin(), good3_2.end(), hasGreaterAbundance);
00171 
00172     MassDistribution test3_2 = table.distribution(2);
00173     sort(test3_2.begin(), test3_2.end(), hasGreaterAbundance);
00174 
00175 //    cout << "good:\n" << good3_2 << endl;
00176 //    cout << "test:\n" << test3_2 << endl;
00177 
00178     compare(test3_2, good3_2);
00179 }

00182 void test4()
00183 {
00184     using namespace Chemistry;
00185 
00186     const double p0 = .9;
00187     const double p1 = .09;
00188     const double p2 = .009;
00189     const double p3 = 1 - (p0 + p1 + p2);
00190 
00191     const double m0 = 10;
00192     const double m1 = 11;
00193     const double m2 = 12.33;
00194     const double m3 = 13.13;
00195 
00196     MassDistribution md;
00197     md.push_back(MassAbundance(m0, p0));
00198     md.push_back(MassAbundance(m1, p1));
00199     md.push_back(MassAbundance(m2, p2));
00200     md.push_back(MassAbundance(m3, p3));
00201 
00202     cout << "test4 distribution:\n" << md << endl;
00203 
00204     IsotopeTable table(md, 10, 1e-5);
00205 
00206     compare(md, table.distribution(1));
00207 
00208     MassDistribution test4_2 = table.distribution(2);
00209 
00210     cout << "2 atoms:\n" << test4_2 << endl;
00211 }

00214 void testSulfur()
00215 {
00216     using namespace Chemistry;
00217     Element::Info info;
00218 
00219     IsotopeTable table(info[Element::Se].isotopes, 10, 1e-10);
00220    
00221     cout << table << endl; 
00222 
00223     MassDistribution dist10 = table.distribution(10);
00224     cout << "distribution: " << dist10 << endl;
00225 }

00228 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00229 {
00230     try
00231     {
00232         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00233         if (os_) *os_ << "IsotopeTableTest\n" << setprecision(12);
00234         test1();
00235         test2();
00236         test3();
00237         //test4();
00238         //testSulfur();
00239         return 0;
00240     }
00241     catch (exception& e)
00242     {
00243         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00244         return 1;
00245     }
00246 }
